thread.title: School play tackles medical impact of Flint water crisis
thread.title_full: School play tackles medical impact of Flint water crisis

author: Roberto Acosta | racosta1@mlive.com
title: School play tackles medical impact of Flint water crisis
text: "No matter their religion, race, or socio-economic status, they are being challenged by this poisonous tragedy," Matern said. "It helped me realize that it unites us all...in a negative way of course, but that unification can also turn positive. If we keep increasing the volume our voices must be heard."
